title.en: An Aspiration Connected with the Stages of the Path of the Three Roots, from the Heart-Essence of the Vast Expanse

text.en: Samantabhadra, Vajrasattva, Garab Dorje,
text.en-trans: kunzang dorjé sempa garab jé

text.en: Padmākara—embodiment of infinite buddhas,
text.en-trans: rabjam gyalwé chizuk pema jung

text.en: King, subject and companion,1Omniscient Father and Son,2
text.en-trans: jebang drok sum künkhyen yabsé sok

text.en: And vidyādharas of the three lineages of transmission—pray grant me your attention!
text.en-trans: kabab gyü sum rigdzin gong su sol

text.en: Lordly gurus, who confer wisdom’s direct transmission
text.en-trans: gonggyü yeshe ngöntsol lama jé

text.en: And whose three secrets are the billowing arrays of the Illusory Net,
text.en-trans: sang sum gyutrul dorjé köpé trin

text.en: Infinite peaceful and wrathful deities of the Collected Teachings of the Awesome Ones,
text.en-trans: palchen kadü zhitro rabjam dang

text.en: And Kharchen, mistress of ḍākinīs, pray grant me your attention!
text.en-trans: khar chen daki wangchuk gong su sol

text.en: May the three vajras of my original state, spontaneously present from the very beginning,
text.en-trans: döné lhündrub nyukmé dorjé sum

text.en: Be matured by the four empowerments of the vase that confers majesty;
text.en-trans: gyaltab chiluk wang zhi min jepé

text.en: May I thereby gain the ability to enter the four maṇḍalas
text.en-trans: kyilkhor nam zhi lam la juk nüpé

text.en: And accomplish the supreme fortune of the vajra family.
text.en-trans: dorjé rik kyi kalpa chok drub shok

text.en: May I perfect the path of the preliminaries by renouncing existence,
text.en-trans: si lé ngejung ngöndrö lam tar sön

text.en: Establish the foundation of the Great Vehicle through altruism,
text.en-trans: zhenpen lo yi tekchen lam tsa tsuk

text.en: Cleanse my mind by means of accumulation and purification
text.en-trans: sak dang jangwé gyü dak khyepardu

text.en: And, with consummate devotion in particular, cause my mind and the guru’s wisdom to merge as one.
text.en-trans: mögü tarchin tuk yi chik dré shok

text.en: Through the five samādhis and four hidden instructions,
text.en-trans: tingdzin nga dang gabpa nam zhi yi

text.en: The generation phase that perceives the world and inhabitants as the guru
text.en-trans: nöchü lamar shepé kyerim dang

text.en: And the profound perfection phase whereby mind and wisdom merge as one,
text.en-trans: tuk yi chik dré zabmö dzokrim gyi

text.en: May I master the five experiences of movement, attainment, familiarity, stability and perfection.
text.en-trans: yo tob gom ten nyam nga tarchin shok

text.en: Through the perfection stage of theWish-Fulfilling Jewel of the Oral Lineage
text.en-trans: nyengyü yizhin norbü dzokrim dang

text.en: And the swift path of the messenger-consort known asBuddhahood Without Meditation,
text.en-trans: ma gom sangye ponyé lam nyur gyi

text.en: May I easily attain the four stages of the vidyādharas
text.en-trans: rigdzin nam zhi gopang delak drub

text.en: And perfect the qualities of the ten stages and five paths.
text.en-trans: sa chu lam ngé yönten tar sön shok

text.en: In particular, by the power of purifying body, speech and mind
text.en-trans: khyepar tek chok shintu naljor gyi

text.en: Through the Supreme Vehicle’s Atiyoga practices ofseparating3saṃsāra and nirvāṇa on both outer and inner levels
text.en-trans: chinang rushen go sum jangwé tü

text.en: May Idistinguish4mind from awareness, abide in the view by means of thefour ways of leaving things as they are,5
text.en-trans: sem rik shenjé chok zhak zhi tawa

text.en: Enhance my experience by meditating on the six lamps of luminosity,
text.en-trans: ösal drön druk gompé bokyung té

text.en: Perfect the practice of the four visions of luminosity
text.en-trans: ösal nang zhi nyamlen tar sön né

text.en: And actualize the stage of the indestructible rainbow body!
text.en-trans: jalü dorjé gopang ngöngyur shok

text.en: If I lack the fortune to be liberated in this life
text.en-trans: tongwé chö la drolwé kal men na

text.en: May I be freed within the expanse of the ground in any of the three intermediate states,
text.en-trans: bardo sum du zhi long drolwa dang

text.en: Arrive at a natural nirmāṇakāya pure realm, and, through the force of my enlightened activity,
text.en-trans: rangzhin trulpé zhing drö trinlé tü

text.en: Be able to deliver all beings to the primordial state!
text.en-trans: dro kün dömé sa la kyel nü shok
